client.Events

Class EventServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Events.EventServices

  • public class EventServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the business logic related to the courses on the client side.

      • handleCreateEvent

        public void handleCreateEvent(java.sql.Date dateTimeEvent,
                              float duration,
                              int idRoom,
                              int idCourse,
                              int idTeacher,
                              int idClass,
                              int idPromo,
                              int idDepartement)
        This method creates String with all event attributes and send it to the server to create the event
        Parameters:
        dateTimeEvent - : the time and the date when the event begin
        duration - : the duration of the event
        idRoom - : the room when the event will take place
        idCourse - : the course related to the event
        idTeacher - : the teacher related to the event
        idClass - : the class related to the event
        idPromo - : the promo related to the event
        iddepartement - : the departement related to the event

                              int idCourse,

                              int idClass,
                              int idPromo,
                              int idDepartement)
        This method create String with all event attributes and send it to the server to update the event
        Parameters:
        idEvent - : the id of the Event
        dateTimeEvent - : the time and the date when the event begin
        duration - : the duration of the event
        idRoom - : the room when the event will take place
        idCourse - : the course related to the event
        idTeacher - : the teacher related to the event
        idClass - : the class related to the event
        idPromo - : the promo related to the event
        iddepartement - : the departement related to the event

      • handleCreatedEvent

        public void handleCreatedEvent(java.lang.String msg)
        This method split the server message to see if the creation is a success or a failure. It change a state for the UI.
        Parameters:
        msg - : String with the result of creation
